message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counterpropose a price of $13,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high. I'm willing to come down slightly to $13,750.

I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $13,500 for the product. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're willing to accept.
